productionRecord.title: Production Record
productionRecord.description: A record of a production activity.

date.description: The date of the production activity.

factory.description: The factory where the production took place.

formsNumber.description: The forms number associated with the activity.

activityType.description: The type of activity (e.g., USINAGEM, PROGRAMAÇÃO).

machine.description: The machine used for the activity.

machiningTime.description: The time spent on machining, in minutes.

status.description: The status of the production activity.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the record was created.

observations.description: Additional notes or observations about the production activity.

material.description: The type of material being machined (e.g., Aço 1045, Alumínio 6061).

rawMaterialDimensions.description: The dimensions of the raw material (e.g., 'D:100mm L:200mm' or '100x50x30mm').

geometryComplexity.description: The complexity of the part's geometry.

toolCount.description: The number of distinct tools used (for machining centers).

fixtureType.description: The type of fixture used to hold the part (for machining centers).

predictedMachiningTime.description: The predicted machining time in minutes, generated by AI.

partDrawing.description: URL or identifier for the part's drawing image.

lossRecord.title: Loss Record
lossRecord.description: A record of a production loss.

date.description: The date when the loss occurred.

machine.description: The machine where the loss occurred.

lossReason.description: The reason for the production loss.

factory.description: The factory where the loss occurred.

timeLost.description: The time lost due to the issue.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the record was created.

observations.description: Additional notes or observations about the loss.

formsNumber.description: The forms number associated with the activity.
